com.topcoder.message.email
Class EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.message.email.EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.activation.DataSource
Enclosing class:
EmailEngine
public static class EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.activation.DataSource

AttachmentDataSource class implements DataSource to be wrapped with a DataHandler for the creation of MimeBodyPart instances to add into the Multipart instance that make up the body of the MimeMessage.

Version:
$Revision: 124213 $
Author:
yellow_gecko
